channel.title: capyac on SHELTRON Visuals
channel.description: Recent content in capyac on SHELTRON Visuals

item.title: capyac
item.description: Live performance of Audio-Reactive Shaders VJ for CAPYAC in 2015 I was lucky enough to meet the talented folks at CAPYAC and become a part of their live show. I use many types of software like VDMX, WebGL and Magic Music Visuals to run custom GLSL shaders and ISF. By hooking a direct audio feed from the stage mixer into the shaders I can get some really responsive audio reactive stuff going on.
